values.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
values.name: ai-tf-dev-vpce-sg

after.description: Security group for interface VPC endpoints
after.name: ai-tf-dev-vpce-sg

description.constant_value: Security group for interface VPC endpoints

az_count.description: Number of AZs to use (2 or 3).

container_image.description: Container image URI for the application (e.g., <account>.dkr.ecr.<region>.amazonaws.com/repo:tag).

db_multi_az.description: Whether to enable Multi-AZ for RDS.

domain_name.description: Optional custom domain name for the ALB (requires existing Route53 hosted zone). Leave empty to skip Route53/ACM.

enable_nat_gateway.description: Whether to create NAT gateways for private subnets.

enable_vpc_endpoints.description: Create common VPC endpoints (S3 gateway + interface endpoints).

hosted_zone_id.description: Optional Route53 hosted zone ID for domain_name. Required if domain_name is set.

project_name.description: Project/name prefix used for resource naming.

single_nat_gateway.description: If true, create a single NAT gateway (cost-optimized, not HA).
